group_1.textLeft: You're planning on leaving Kamihama and@starting over, right?
...Don't do it. Let's go home.

group_1.textRight: No can do...
I can't just...forget about Iroha or everyone else...
But I feel so awful about what happened to them.@It's crushin' me...

group_1.textLeft: It's not your fault, Felicia.@You don't have to feel sorry for her...
Yachiyo has it right.@We shouldn't worry about her.
Sad as it is, it's worse to get stuck always looking@back at what she did to save us.
Besides, you know better than anyone how hard@it is to forget.

group_1.textRight: But even though I remember, I'll never be@forgiven...
I know if I told Iroha and Ui "I'm sorry"...
They'd tell me "it's okay" and everything@would be all better.
But I don't even know if they can hear me now.
Or even if they can, my words won't reach 'em...!
I just...I wanna hear them tell me "It'll be@okay" again...

group_1.textLeft: So rather than letting those feelings eat away at@you, causing you to keep releasing your Doppel,
you thought it would be better if you forgot all@about Iroha and the others.

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: ...That's what Yachiyo said.
Back then, Iroha was the only person who@could save us.
So she stepped forward and made that sacrifice.

group_1.narration: "If our response to everything she did for us@is 'I'm sorry', it just hurts everyone."
"Instead, we should all say 'Thank you'@and try to smile for her."

group_1.textLeft: That's the gist of it, anyway...
But you know something? Even though I just told@you that, I can't help but regret everything too.
I'm the Mightiest, and I was Iroha's senior.@It feels like there's more I should've done.
But I know if I were in her position, I wouldn't@want people to feel guilty.
I'd want them to smile and say "Thank you@for saving my life."

group_1.textRight: So are my feelings wrong, then...?

group_1.textLeft: No. These feelings of guilt and helplessness are@what makes us stronger.
That's why you should embrace them.
They remind us that we should be thankful,@and are fuel for us to become stronger.
Because she gave us the time to do that...@She gave us a future.

group_1.textRight: I get it... If we forget, it'll keep us weak.
But if we become stronger, we won't be put in@that same position again.
And maybe it'll let us get Iroha and Ui back too.

group_1.textLeft: Exactly, exactly.@There's still a future.
Right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...@Someday, I'm gonna bring 'em both back!
C'mon, let's go!

group_1.textLeft: That's the spirit![chara:100301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100301:cheek_1][chara:100301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:100301:motion_200][chara:100301:lipSynch_1] Yep yep!

group_1.textRight: I'm home...

group_1.textLeft: I brought her back!
Felicia...!@I was so worried about you!
If someone else were to disappear on me too,@I wouldn't be able to stand it...!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I'm sorry, Sana...

group_1.textLeft: Do you feel better?

group_1.textRight: Yeah... I'm thankful for the time they gave us.
I'll repay 'em by bringin' 'em back someday...
Yeah, I'm gonna bring Iroha and Ui home!

group_1.textLeft: (I notice she left out Touka and Nemu...)
*Chuckle*

group_1.textRight: Ah well.

group_1.textCenter: Every day, we can wake up to see the morning...@That is our joy.
